availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles L Keene (Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, grocery story owner and merchant.)

body.p: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, grocery story owner and merchant. Born in 1804 in Kentucky. Married to Jane Elizabeth Keene. Father to Elizabeth Keene, William Keene, Lucian Keene, Nancy Keene, and John Keene. Merchant in 1850. Grocery Store owner in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Directic 1, p. 172B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, District 1, p. 8-9.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 2
Find A Grave, "Charles Lake Keene, Jr. (1804-1887)," Memorial #22884574, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22884574 (accessed May 23, 2019).
Find A Grave, "Jane Elizabeth Keene (1819-1908)," Memorial #22884576, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22884576/jane-elizabeth-keene (accessed May 24, 2019).
